ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | kqval.2 | |- F = ( x e. X |-> { y e. J | x e. y } ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_kqffn | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> F Fn X ) |
| 3 |  | #P_qtopid | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ F Fn X ) -> F e. ( J Cn ( J qTop F ) ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_mpdan | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> F e. ( J Cn ( J qTop F ) ) ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_kqval | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> ( KQ ` J ) = ( J qTop F ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> ( J Cn ( KQ ` J ) ) = ( J Cn ( J qTop F ) ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> F e. ( J Cn ( KQ ` J ) ) ) |
